wrote:
> To simply crawl a couple of websites you d=
o not need to write code 
at all.
> 
> Simply follow the first few steps in=
 the user manual:
> http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual.html
> =

> On linux the important steps are:
> 1. Download the compiled version
> 2=
. Untar it into a directory (lets call it INSTALL here)
> 3. go into INSTAL=
L
> 4. export HERITRIX_HOME=3D`pwd`
> 5. go into bin
> 6. chmod 744 *
> 7. =
start heritrix with: './heritrix -pPORTNUMBER' (-p not nessecary 
if 
> you=
 can use the default port 8080)
> 8. open a webbrowser at: http://localhost=
:8080
> 9. login with 'admin/letmein'
> 10. configure your crawl - use the =
default profiles (remember to 
set 
> user-agent-field and e-mail-adress at=
 the settings-tab) - put in 
your seeds
> 11. on the frontpage of the UI cl=
ick 'start crawling pending jobs'
> 12. enjoy
> 
> best
> Bjarne Andersen
>=
 
>
